) R1 ,(SELECT @ROWNUM := #{startRow, jdbcType=INTEGER})TEMP LIMIT #{rowPerPage, jdbcType=INTEGER} OFFSET #{startRow, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT RESTDE_NO ,RESTDE_DATE ,RESTDE_TYPE ,RESTDE_NAME ,RESTDE_REMARK ,USED_YN FROM RESTDE WHERE RESTDE_DATE BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate} AND USED_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY RESTDE_NO
SELECT RESTDE_NO ,RESTDE_DATE ,RESTDE_TYPE ,RESTDE_NAME ,RESTDE_REMARK ,USED_YN FROM RESTDE WHERE RESTDE_NO = #{restDeNo}

SELECT IFNULL(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT R.STTUS_CODE ORDER BY R.STTUS_CODE SEPARATOR ',' ),'') AS REST_STATUS ,IFNULL( SUM(R.STS01_CNT),0) AS STS01_CNT ,( SELECT IFNULL(MAX(USED_YN),'N') FROM RESTDE WHERE RESTDE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND USED_YN='Y') DUP_YN FROM ( SELECT A.RESVE_DE , CASE B.STTUS_CODE WHEN 'STS03' THEN 'STS01' ELSE B.STTUS_CODE END AS STTUS_CODE , CASE WHEN B.STTUS_CODE IN ('STS01','STS03') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS STS01_CNT FROM RESVE_STTUS A JOIN RESVE_HIST B ON A.RESVE_NO = B.RESVE_NO AND A.RESVE_DE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND A.CANCL_YN ='N' AND A.COMPT_YN ='N' AND B.REG_DT = (SELECT MAX(AA.REG_DT) FROM RESVE_HIST AA WHERE AA.RESVE_NO = A.RESVE_NO ) WHERE B.STTUS_CODE IN ('STS00','STS01','STS03') ) R
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESTDE ( RESTDE_DATE, RESTDE_NAME, REG_EMPNO, REG_DT ) VALUES (#{restDeDate}, #{restDeName}, #{regEmpno},now(6))

choose.when: DELETE FROM RESVE_STTUS WHERE RESVE_DE = #{RESVE_DE} AND RESVE_NO = #{RESVE_NO}
